hero.name: Toussaint Chen
hero.heading: Welcome!
hero.description: I build sleek, high-performing websites and turn complex data into clear insights. My work bridges creativity and analytics which helps brands communicate better, perform smarter, and make data-driven decisions that matter.

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR WEB AND DATA ANALYTICS PROJECTS
about.description: I specialize in helping organizations transform their online presence and decision-making through thoughtful design and data solutions. From responsive websites to interactive dashboards, I focus on crafting tools that are not only functional but meaningful, empowering clients to connect, measure, and grow with confidence.

details.title: Website Development for The Repair Campaign
details.description: The Repair Campaign website is a dynamic WordPress-powered platform developed to amplify Caribbean reparatory justice initiatives. It features responsive design, integrated analytics, and SEO-optimized content blocks to support education, advocacy, and community mobilization across the region.

details.title: Website Development for NCB Finiancial Group
details.description: NCB Financial Group's Wealth Management page is a user-friendly online resource designed to help customers estimate their loan repayments. Built with responsive design principles, it provides general information and allows users to input loan amount, interest rate, and term to generate accurate monthly payment figures, enhancing financial planning and decision-making.

details.title: Website Design
details.description: Simple Website design for Preelabs website to be build on the Wix platform

details.title: Sample Marketing Dashboard
details.description: This Ecommerce Marketing Dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of key performance indicators (KPIs) such as sales trends, customer demographics, and campaign effectiveness. Utilizing interactive charts and graphs, it enables marketers to make data-driven decisions to optimize strategies and improve ROI.

sectionHeading.title: Web and Data services I provide

allService.title: Website Design
allService.subTitle: I design clean, modern, and responsive websites that align with your brand and engage your audience effectively.

allService.title: Website Development
allService.subTitle: I build fast, secure, and scalable websites using modern frameworks and best practices for performance and reliability.

allService.title: Data Analytics
allService.subTitle: I uncover insights from data to help businesses understand patterns, improve strategy, and make informed decisions.

allService.title: Data Visualization
allService.subTitle: I create clear, interactive visuals and dashboards that make complex information easy to explore and share.
